name: wsl-manager
title: WSL Manager
description: Seamlessly manage WSL distributions and open projects in your preferred editor directly from Raycast.

commands.name: open-project
commands.title: Open WSL Project
commands.description: Open a project directly in VS Code Remote
commands.subtitle: WSL Manager

preferences.name: projectRoots
preferences.title: Project Directories
preferences.description: Comma-separated list of directories to scan for projects (e.g. ~, ~/code)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
